sentence.text: No drug-drug interaction studies in human subjects have been conducted.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> <cue> No </cue> drug-drug interaction studies in human subjects have been conducted. </scope>

sentence.text: Toxicologic and toxicokinetic studies in rats did not demonstrate any alterations in the clearance or toxicologic profile of either methotrexate or Kineret when the two agents were administered together.
sentence.negationtags: Toxicologic and toxicokinetic studies in rats did <scope> <cue> not demonstrate </cue> any alterations in the clearance or toxicologic profile of either methotrexate or Kineret when the two agents were administered together. </scope>

sentence.text: In a study in which patients with active RA were treated for up to 24 weeks with concurrent Kineret and etanercept therapy, a 7% rate of serious infections was observed, which was higher than that observed with etanercept alone (0%).
Two percent of patients treated concurrently with Kineret and etanercept developed neutropenia (ANC 1 x 109/L).
